thread.title: CNN Travel lauds the Hill Country as one of the best places to visit in the world
thread.title_full: CNN Travel lauds the Hill Country as one of the best places to visit in the world

author: KVUE Staff
title: CNN Travel lauds the Hill Country as one of the best places to visit in the world
text: stop and smell the bluebonnets CNN Travel lauds the Hill Country as one of the best places to visit in the world A new report says that one of the [best places](https://austin.culturemap.com/news/travel/hill-country-best-places-travel/) to [visit](https://austin.culturemap.com/news/travel/hill-country-best-places-travel/) in the entire world is right here in Central Texas. [CNN Travel](https://www.cnn.com/travel) named the Texas Hill Country one of the [best places to visit in the world in 2024](https://www.cnn.com/travel/best-destinations-to-visit-2024/index.html). The region was included alongside 23 other destinations, including Greece, Morocco, Panama and Greenland. CNN Travel said the intention of the report was to highlight "places that are still largely undiscovered, or alluring in the offseason, or frequently overlooked for their larger first cities or neighbors." It also includes locales that it says are "making it easier for tourists to visit and those that pay close attention to encouraging tourism that's sustainable." The Central Texas area is one of only three destinations in the U.S. featured in the report. The others are northwest Michigan and Florida's freshwater springs. In the report, CNN Travel cited the Hill Country's springs, trails, wineries, dance halls and more as reasons for globetrotters to make a stop. Below is the full entry on the region: "In the heart of Texas, Hill Country boasts its own natural springs. One prime spot, [Krause Springs](https://laketravis.com/lake-travis/krause-springs/) in Spicewood, lures visitors with more than its spring-fed pool and natural swimming hole — there’s also a butterfly garden full of magical wind chimes. And the [Blue Bonnet Cafe](https://www.bluebonnetcafe.net/) — home to some of the world’s most divine cream pies — is just a short drive away in [Marble Falls](https://visitmarblefalls.org/). [...] -- Read the full story and watch the video at CultureMap news partner [KVUE.com](https://www.kvue.com/article/news/local/texas-hill-country-best-places-to-visit-world-2024/269-214fee17-242e-471c-88ed-b7ff59da968e#:~:text=TEXAS%2C%20USA%20%E2%80%94%20A%20new%20report,%2C%20Morocco%2C%20Panama%20and%20Greenland.).
